column5: The student can choose betweentwo main paths:Research in Acoustics (MR AC)Environmental Acoustics: Transport, Building, City (AETBV)These two paths have acommon baseof fundamental modulesand specific modules.At the end of the Master’s program, a 4- to 6-monthinternshipis required in a laboratory, a large organization or a company.
column7: Around € 500 /year, either French or Foreign students
